languages.text: "Да-а-а, рыжая, и, конечно же, когда я явлюсь к твоим родственничкам, они встретят меня с распростертыми объятьями и немедленно вручат подарок... ты и сама у них не в почете, Ирлиэт, а мон-кай-ведьма — и подавно".

"Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"
languages.original_text: "Да-а-а, рыжая, и, конечно же, когда я явлюсь к твоим родственничкам, они встретят меня с распростертыми объятьями и немедленно вручат подарок... ты и сама у них не в почете, Ирлиэт, а мон-кай-ведьма — и подавно".

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, red hair, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your dearest kin, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you aren't on great terms with them, then what's there to say about a mon-keigh witch?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, red hair, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your dearest kin, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you aren't on great terms with them, then what's there to say about a mon-keigh witch?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “是啊，小红毛，我相信他们确实有。等我拜访你那些至亲至爱的族人时，我相信他们一定会张开双臂欢迎我，给我各种各样的礼物，把我宠到天上去……你看，伊莉耶特，就连你自己和他们的关系都不怎么样，那我一个猴子女巫，又能怎么样呢？”
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，小红毛，我相信他们确实有。等我拜访你那些至亲至爱的族人时，我相信他们一定会张开双臂欢迎我，给我各种各样的礼物，把我宠到天上去……你看，伊莉耶特，就连你自己和他们的关系都不怎么样，那我一个猴子女巫，又能怎么样呢？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Claro, roja, no me cabe duda. Y en cuanto visite a tus seres más queridos, estoy convencida de que me recibirán con los brazos abiertos y me colmarán de regalos... Mira, Yrliet, si ni tú te llevas bien con ellos, ¿qué esperas que le ocurra a una bruja mon-keigh?».
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"

traits.locale_text: «Claro, roja, no me cabe duda. Y en cuanto visite a tus seres más queridos, estoy convencida de que me recibirán con los brazos abiertos y me colmarán de regalos... Mira, Yrliet, si ni tú te llevas bien con ellos, ¿qué esperas que le ocurra a una bruja mon-keigh?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, ja, Rote, sicher doch. Und sobald ich Eure Lieben besuche, heißen sie mich bestimmt mit offenen Armen willkommen und überschütten mich mit Geschenken ... Hört mal, Yrliet, wenn Ihr schon kein gutes Verhältnis zu ihnen habt, welche Chancen hat dann wohl eine Chem-Pan-Sey-Hexe?"
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"

traits.locale_text: Oh, ja, Rote, sicher doch. Und sobald ich Eure Lieben besuche, heißen sie mich bestimmt mit offenen Armen willkommen und überschütten mich mit Geschenken ... Hört mal, Yrliet, wenn Ihr schon kein gutes Verhältnis zu ihnen habt, welche Chancen hat dann wohl eine Chem-Pan-Sey-Hexe?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「きっとそうよ、レッド。あんたの親しい人たちをあたいが訪ねたら、彼らは両腕を広げて歓迎してくれて、プレゼントで甘やかしてくれるわ…だってユリエット。もしあんたと彼らの仲が悪いなら、モン＝ケイの魔女なんて相手にされないでしょ？」
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"

traits.locale_text: 「きっとそうよ、レッド。あんたの親しい人たちをあたいが訪ねたら、彼らは両腕を広げて歓迎してくれて、プレゼントで甘やかしてくれるわ…だってユリエット。もしあんたと彼らの仲が悪いなら、モン＝ケイの魔女なんて相手にされないでしょ？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Mais oui, la rouquine, j'en suis sûre. Vos proches m'accueilleront à bras ouverts et me couvriront de présents... Écoutez, Yrliet, vous n'êtes déjà pas en très bons termes avec eux. Une sorcière mon-keigh n'a pas la moindre chance. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais oui, la rouquine, j'en suis sûre. Vos proches m'accueilleront à bras ouverts et me couvriront de présents... Écoutez, Yrliet, vous n'êtes déjà pas en très bons termes avec eux. Une sorcière mon-keigh n'a pas la moindre chance. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Aynen Kızıl, eminim öyledir. Kesin en yakınlarını ziyaret ettiğimde beni bekliyor olurlar, önüme hediyeler sererler... Bak Yrliet, sen bile onlarla anlaşamıyorsan mon-keigh cadının tekinin ne şansı olabilir ki?"
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, Red, I'm sure they do. And as soon as I visit your nearest and dearest, I'm sure they'll welcome me with open arms and spoil me with gifts... Look, Yrliet, if you're not on great terms with them, then what chance does a mon-keigh witch have?"

traits.locale_text: "Aynen Kızıl, eminim öyledir. Kesin en yakınlarını ziyaret ettiğimde beni bekliyor olurlar, önüme hediyeler sererler... Bak Yrliet, sen bile onlarla anlaşamıyorsan mon-keigh cadının tekinin ne şansı olabilir ki?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
